channel.title: Need some Help here
channel.description:
ok... this is really wierd. After about 10 mins of running the server, maybe less i get this error: [b]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space[/b]
So what is this error? and After i had it Ppl can no longer connect to it, ppl that were on it can still play. :confused:
Also, If when im running it before the error and i press ctrlatldel comination it says JAVA.EXE - 102153 KB so it says it uses 102mb ram so that cant b normal, can it?

item.title: Need some Help here
item.dc:creator: @Mladen Mladen
item.description:
@Mladen wrote:

Haha thats a funny problem… Java is right… the guy up there dont know java…

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Help here
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

God, why don’t you actually look at the error? It says theres no more memory. You think having people on the server doesn’t take any space from the heap ?

Although, if you had something saying -Xmx< number >x when you started the server, removing it will help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some Help here
item.dc:creator: @freakolivier freakolivier
item.description:
@freakolivier wrote:

bobby it cant b that.

I did a rollback of 1 week and i still get the error but 1 week ago it didnt so its not that

Read full topic
